title.value: Эффективность применения инкрустирующих составов с использованием гексилового эфира 5-аминолевулиновой кислоты на урожайность и качество льноволокна
Efficiency of incrustation compositions application with hexyl ether of 5-aminolevulinic acid on yield and fiber flax quality

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Azarova, E.V., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center for Arable Farming (Belarus). Institute of Flax

abstract.value: The paper presents the results of studies on the effectiveness of the hexyl ester of 5-aminolevulinic acid (HE-ALA) in the incrustation mixtures on yield and quality indicators of fiber flax (Linum usitatissimum L.). Found that HE-ALA concentration of 0,15 grams per liter is more conducive to higher yields and quality indicators of long scotched fiber flax. Thus, the use of Kinto Duo, 2,0 liters per ton + ET-ALA, 0,15  grams per liter give yields: 15,8 hundreds kilograms per hectare total and 9,8 hundreds kilograms per hectare of a long fiber and lower than the reference version 2,7 and 2,5 hundreds kilograms per hectare, respectively. The quality of the fiber of 0,7 number, specific yield of fiber flax breaking length was 61,9%.
